simplified: 一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴

pronunciation.pinyin: yī cùn guāng yīn yī cùn jīn , cùn jīn nán mǎi cùn guāng yīn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 cun4 guang1 yin1 yi1 cun4 jin1 , cun4 jin1 nan2 mai3 cun4 guang1 yin1

details.simplified: 一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴
details.traditional: 一寸光陰一寸金，寸金難買寸光陰

meanings.value: An interval of time is worth an ounce of gold, money cannot buy you time.
